typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		ProjectID as string,
		Context as string,
		{Type of platform} as short,
		{SheTrades Project} as string,
		{Date of data collection} as short,
		{First name} as string,
		{Last name} as string,
		Gender as string,
		{Year of birth} as string,
		Country as string,
		Email as string,
		{Job title} as string,
		{Professional status} as string,
		{Organization/ Company name} as string,
		{Type of entity} as string,
		City as string,
		Size as string,
		ISIC as string,
		{Please select the area of your activity} as string,
		HS as string,
		{Owner/ top manager gender} as string,
		{Owner/ top manager age} as string,
		{Type of event} as string,
		{Phone number} as string,
		{Registration Date} as timestamp,
		{Submission Date} as timestamp,
		{Middle name} as string,
		{Date of birth} as date,
		{Sub-type of entity} as string,
		{BSO ownership} as string,
		{Office Address} as string,
		{Post Code} as string,
		Website as string,
		Twitter as string,
		LinkedIn as string,
		FILE_NAME as string,
		LOAD_TIMESTAMP as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> SrcSheTrades
source(output(
		ENTITY_SR_KEY as integer,
		ENTITY_ID as integer,
		VERSION_NO as integer,
		ENTITY_NAME as string,
		ENTITY_EMAIL_DOMAIN_NAME as string,
		ADDRESS as string,
		CITY as string,
		REGION as string,
		{PHONE NUMBER} as string,
		WEBSITE as string,
		TWITTER as string,
		LINKEDIN as string,
		BSO_OWNERSHIP as string,
		POST_CODE as string,
		POBOX as string,
		CITY_REGION as string,
		CATEGORY as string,
		CONFIDENTIAL as string,
		SOCIAL_MEDIA as string,
		OTHER_EMAILS as string,
		OTHER_PHONE_NUMBERS as string,
		OTHER_INFORMATION as string,
		MAILING_ADDRESS_STREET1 as string,
		MAILING_ADDRESS_STREET2 as string,
		MAILING_ADDRESS_CITY as string,
		MAILING_STATE_PROVICE as string,
		MAILING_POST_CODE as string,
		MAILING_COUNTRY as string,
		MAILING_FORMAT_UN as string,
		FIRM_ID as string,
		BATCH_ID as integer,
		SOURCE as string,
		CREATED_BY as string,
		UPDATED_BY as string,
		DATE_CREATED as timestamp,
		DATE_UPDATED as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> ExistingDIM
source(output(
		ENTITY_SR_KEY as integer,
		ENTITY_ID as integer,
		VERSION_NO as integer,
		ENTITY_NAME as string,
		ENTITY_EMAIL_DOMAIN_NAME as string,
		ADDRESS as string,
		CITY as string,
		REGION as string,
		{PHONE NUMBER} as string,
		WEBSITE as string,
		TWITTER as string,
		LINKEDIN as string,
		BSO_OWNERSHIP as string,
		POST_CODE as string,
		POBOX as string,
		CITY_REGION as string,
		CATEGORY as string,
		CONFIDENTIAL as string,
		SOCIAL_MEDIA as string,
		OTHER_EMAILS as string,
		OTHER_PHONE_NUMBERS as string,
		OTHER_INFORMATION as string,
		MAILING_ADDRESS_STREET1 as string,
		MAILING_ADDRESS_STREET2 as string,
		MAILING_ADDRESS_CITY as string,
		MAILING_STATE_PROVICE as string,
		MAILING_POST_CODE as string,
		MAILING_COUNTRY as string,
		MAILING_FORMAT_UN as string,
		FIRM_ID as string,
		BATCH_ID as integer,
		SOURCE as string,
		CREATED_BY as string,
		UPDATED_BY as string,
		DATE_CREATED as timestamp,
		DATE_UPDATED as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> ExstingDim1
source(output(
		MAX_VAL as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'Select IsNULL(Max(ENTITY_ID),0) MAX_VAL\nFROM MART_OWNER.DIM_ENTITY',
	format: 'query') ~> ExstingDimMaxID
SrcSheTrades filter(upper(trim({Professional status}))=='SELF-EMPLOYED/ FREELANCER') ~> FilterProfessionalStatu
FilterProfessionalStatu select(mapColumn(
		ProjectID,
		EMAIL = Email,
		ENTITY_NAME = {Organization/ Company name},
		CITY = City,
		BSO_OWNERSHIP = {BSO ownership},
		ADDRESS = {Office Address},
		POST_CODE = {Post Code},
		WEBSITE = Website,
		TWITTER = Twitter,
		LINKEDIN = LinkedIn,
		FILE_NAME,
		LOAD_TIMESTAMP,
		SOURCE = FILE_NAME
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectIN
SelectIN aggregate(groupBy({Organization/ Company name} = ENTITY_NAME),
	each(match(name!='ENTITY_NAME'), $$ = last($$))) ~> AggDistinct
ExistingDIM select(mapColumn(
		EXIST_ENTITY_ID = ENTITY_ID,
		EXIST_VERSION_NO = VERSION_NO,
		EXIST_ENTITY_NAME = ENTITY_NAME,
		EXIST_ENTITY_EMAIL_DOMAIN_NAME = ENTITY_EMAIL_DOMAIN_NAME,
		EXIST_ADDRESS = ADDRESS,
		EXIST_CITY = CITY,
		EXIST_WEBSITE = WEBSITE,
		EXIST_TWITTER = TWITTER,
		EXIST_LINKEDIN = LINKEDIN,
		EXIST_BSO_OWNERSHIP = BSO_OWNERSHIP,
		EXIST_POST_CODE = POST_CODE,
		EXIST_SOURCE = SOURCE
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectExits
ExstingDim1 aggregate(groupBy(ENTITY_NAME,
		ENTITY_ID),
	VERSION_NO = max(VERSION_NO)) ~> LatestEntityID
SelectExits, LatestEntityID join(EXIST_ENTITY_ID == ENTITY_ID
	&& EXIST_ENTITY_NAME == ENTITY_NAME
	&& EXIST_VERSION_NO == VERSION_NO,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join1
Join1 derive(RECORD_HASH = sha2(256,
EXIST_ENTITY_NAME,
EXIST_ENTITY_EMAIL_DOMAIN_NAME,
EXIST_ADDRESS,
EXIST_CITY,
EXIST_WEBSITE,
EXIST_TWITTER,
EXIST_LINKEDIN,
EXIST_SOURCE,
EXIST_BSO_OWNERSHIP,
EXIST_POST_CODE
)) ~> ExstingRecordHash
SourceRecordHash, ExstingRecordHashSelect exists(SOURCE_RECORD_HASH == RECORD_HASH,
	negate:true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Exists1
DerivedColumn derive(SOURCE_RECORD_HASH = sha2(256,
{Organization/ Company name},
ENTITY_EMAIL_DOMAIN_NAME,
ADDRESS,
CITY,
WEBSITE,
TWITTER,
LINKEDIN,
FILE_NAME,
BSO_OWNERSHIP,
POST_CODE
)) ~> SourceRecordHash
AggDistinct derive(ENTITY_EMAIL_DOMAIN_NAME = substring(EMAIL, instr(EMAIL, '@')+1)) ~> DerivedColumn
Exists1, ExstingRecordHashSelect lookup({Organization/ Company name} == EXIST_ENTITY_NAME,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Lookup1
Lookup1 split(isNull(EXIST_ENTITY_ID),
	disjoint: false) ~> NewRecords@(NewRecords, UpdateRecord)
NewRecords@NewRecords, ExstingDimMaxID join(1==1,
	joinType:'cross',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join2
Join2 keyGenerate(output(Dim_Surrogate_Key1 as long),
	startAt: 1L) ~> SurrogateKey1
SurrogateKey1 derive(ENTITY_ID = MAX_VAL + Dim_Surrogate_Key1,
		VERSION_NO = 1,
		BATCH_ID = 1,
		SOURCE = FILE_NAME,
		CREATED_BY = FILE_NAME,
		UPDATED_BY = FILE_NAME,
		DATE_CREATED = currentDate(),
		DATE_UPDATED = currentDate()) ~> RunInfor
RunInfor alterRow(insertIf(1==1)) ~> AlterRow1
ExstingRecordHash select(mapColumn(
		EXIST_ENTITY_ID,
		EXIST_VERSION_NO,
		EXIST_ENTITY_NAME,
		RECORD_HASH
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> ExstingRecordHashSelect
NewRecords@UpdateRecord derive(VERSION_NO = EXIST_VERSION_NO + 1,
		BATCH_ID = 1,
		SOURCE = FILE_NAME,
		CREATED_BY = FILE_NAME,
		UPDATED_BY = FILE_NAME,
		DATE_CREATED = currentDate(),
		DATE_UPDATED = currentDate()) ~> RunInfo2
RunInfo2 alterRow(insertIf(1==1)) ~> AlterRow2
AlterRow1 sink(input(
		ENTITY_SR_KEY as integer,
		ENTITY_ID as integer,
		VERSION_NO as integer,
		ENTITY_NAME as string,
		ENTITY_EMAIL_DOMAIN_NAME as string,
		ADDRESS as string,
		CITY as string,
		REGION as string,
		{PHONE NUMBER} as string,
		WEBSITE as string,
		TWITTER as string,
		LINKEDIN as string,
		BSO_OWNERSHIP as string,
		POST_CODE as string,
		POBOX as string,
		CITY_REGION as string,
		CATEGORY as string,
		CONFIDENTIAL as string,
		SOCIAL_MEDIA as string,
		OTHER_EMAILS as string,
		OTHER_PHONE_NUMBERS as string,
		OTHER_INFORMATION as string,
		MAILING_ADDRESS_STREET1 as string,
		MAILING_ADDRESS_STREET2 as string,
		MAILING_ADDRESS_CITY as string,
		MAILING_STATE_PROVICE as string,
		MAILING_POST_CODE as string,
		MAILING_COUNTRY as string,
		MAILING_FORMAT_UN as string,
		FIRM_ID as string,
		BATCH_ID as integer,
		SOURCE as string,
		CREATED_BY as string,
		UPDATED_BY as string,
		DATE_CREATED as timestamp,
		DATE_UPDATED as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		ENTITY_ID,
		VERSION_NO,
		ENTITY_EMAIL_DOMAIN_NAME,
		ADDRESS,
		CITY,
		WEBSITE,
		TWITTER,
		LINKEDIN,
		BSO_OWNERSHIP,
		POST_CODE,
		BATCH_ID,
		SOURCE,
		CREATED_BY,
		UPDATED_BY,
		DATE_CREATED,
		DATE_UPDATED
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> DIMENTITY
AlterRow2 sink(input(
		ENTITY_SR_KEY as integer,
		ENTITY_ID as integer,
		VERSION_NO as integer,
		ENTITY_NAME as string,
		ENTITY_EMAIL_DOMAIN_NAME as string,
		ADDRESS as string,
		CITY as string,
		REGION as string,
		{PHONE NUMBER} as string,
		WEBSITE as string,
		TWITTER as string,
		LINKEDIN as string,
		BSO_OWNERSHIP as string,
		POST_CODE as string,
		POBOX as string,
		CITY_REGION as string,
		CATEGORY as string,
		CONFIDENTIAL as string,
		SOCIAL_MEDIA as string,
		OTHER_EMAILS as string,
		OTHER_PHONE_NUMBERS as string,
		OTHER_INFORMATION as string,
		MAILING_ADDRESS_STREET1 as string,
		MAILING_ADDRESS_STREET2 as string,
		MAILING_ADDRESS_CITY as string,
		MAILING_STATE_PROVICE as string,
		MAILING_POST_CODE as string,
		MAILING_COUNTRY as string,
		MAILING_FORMAT_UN as string,
		FIRM_ID as string,
		BATCH_ID as integer,
		SOURCE as string,
		CREATED_BY as string,
		UPDATED_BY as string,
		DATE_CREATED as timestamp,
		DATE_UPDATED as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		ENTITY_ID = EXIST_ENTITY_ID,
		VERSION_NO,
		ENTITY_NAME = EXIST_ENTITY_NAME,
		ENTITY_EMAIL_DOMAIN_NAME,
		ADDRESS,
		CITY,
		WEBSITE,
		TWITTER,
		LINKEDIN,
		BSO_OWNERSHIP,
		POST_CODE,
		BATCH_ID,
		SOURCE,
		CREATED_BY,
		UPDATED_BY,
		DATE_CREATED,
		DATE_UPDATED
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> DIMENTITY1
